front.title: A Framework Adapting Traditional Routers to ForCES Architecture

abstract.t: In the future, in order to cut CAPex and OPex, it is desirable to integrate traditional routers into ForCES-based NEs. However, some in-service traditional routers may not implement ForCES protocol directly due to their inherent reasons. This document describes a framework where some mechanisms are specified to satisfy the above requirement and some security implications are considered.
